snippet.title: A Highland Song - Official Gameplay Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Take a look at exploration and gameplay in this latest trailer for A Highland Song, an upcoming narrative adventure game coming to PC via Steam and Nintendo Switch. From Inkle, the creators of 80 Days and Heaven's Vault, A Highland Song follows the story of a girl called Moira McKinnon who runs away from her home in the Scottish Highlands after receiving a letter from her Uncle Hamish. Explore the highlands and unearth secrets as you travel to the coast in search of his lighthouse.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
